amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase general project construction funding for the Department of the Army--Corps of Engineers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record regarding the Army Corps of Engineers role in construction of the drinking water system in the District of Columbia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Norton.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
